items.title: Staff strike forces Louvre to close doors to visitors
items.description: The strike action marks the latest disruption for the museum after a jewel theft and water damage.

items.title: What fans, insiders and stats say about embattled Frank
items.description: Tottenham have lost as many league games as they have won this season under Thomas Frank, with some fans criticising his style of play. BBC Sport asse...

items.title: What we know about the Bondi gunmen
items.description: Two gunmen involved in the attack have been identified by the Australian authorities as a father and son.

items.title: Give newborns automatic library cards, authors urge
items.description: Writers including Sir Philip Pullman back a proposal to automatically sign up newborns to a library in a bid to boost literacy.

items.title: Airbnb fined Â£56m by Spain for advertising unlicensed properties
items.description: The government has been cracking down on the rentals firm as neighbourhoods protest against holiday lets.
